content: of the lace collar rds 7-10 repeat round 6 four more times or to your desired collar width before proceeding to final round round 11 final round single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet ch6 double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in every chain-6 space around entire collar fasten_off weave in ends your ginsburg legacy collar is complete finishing most garments benefit greatly from blocking block the garment according to your yarn s specification in most cases you can simply wet the garment gently wring out the excess moisture and lay it onto a towel shape the collar into a circle and let dry congratulations on completing your ginsburg legacy collar wear it when you vote or anytime you d like to remember the incredible life and legacy of rbg rest in power september 2020 designer and pattern information contact information designer kristen stein website studioartworks com patterns available on ravelry under kristen stein or modernlacecrochet or on amazon under kristen stein additional information can be found on my blog at http //kristensteinfineart blogspot com or on instagram @kristensteindesigns kristen stein is a contemporary artist living in suburban philadelphia kristen s works are currently available on a variety of online venues and boutiques and galleries throughout the us her art has appeared in numerous printed media including posters books cd covers calendars and program covers her work has been licensed for use on gift items household goods puzzles and jewelry items her work has appeared in a number of solo and group exhibitions and in the set design for various television shows and a major motion picture although the bulk of her portfolio focuses on her original paintings and designs kristen also enjoys needlework and creating her own original crochet patterns pattern pictures and design are all copyrighted by the designer kristen stein © 2020 by kristen stein studioartworks com
